text: Scutiger nyingchiensis is a species of toad found in the Himalayas (China, India, Nepal, Pakistan). It is an alpine species associated with streams in moist, forested and grassland habitats in hilly areas. Its type locality is Nyingchi in Tibet, at the altitude of . ==References== Category:Amphibians of China Category:Frogs of India Category:Amphibians of Nepal Category:Amphibians of Pakistan nyingchiensis Category:Amphibians described in 1977
title: Scutiger nyingchiensis
